channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: CES Live Blog, Day 3: Even More of the Coolest Tech We’ve Seen
item.description: Read our live updates from CES 2026 in Las Vegas to see the latest consumer gadgetry in all of its chatbot-enabled, sensor-packed, AI-infused glory.

item.title: Spotify lowers monetization threshold for video podcasts
item.description: Spotify is dropping the minimum episode requirement to three, minimum consumption hours to 2,000, and engaged audience member threshold to 1,000 over ...

item.title: Spotify now lets you share what you’re streaming in real time with friends
item.description: You can tap a friend’s listening activity to play the track, save it, open the menu, or react with an emoji.

item.title: Tuft & Needle Promo Codes: 20% Off | January 2026
item.description: Save 20% on best-selling mattresses with our top Tuft & Needle coupon codes.

item.title: WhatsApp rolls out new group chat features, including member tags
item.description: You can choose a tag that gives others in the group chat more context about who you are.

item.title: Therabody Promo Codes: 15% Off January 2026
item.description: Save on the science-backed devices you’ve been eyeing with 15% off Theragun discount code and 30% off other great deals.

item.title: 30% Off Canon Promo Codes | January 2026
item.description: Save an extra 10% or 30% with Canon coupon codes, plus up to $1,600 on cameras, printers, and more this January.

item.title: Warner Bros. Discovery rejects Paramount’s bid again, calls it a ‘leveraged buyout’
item.description: The studio's board unanimously rejected Paramount Skydance's revised $108.4 billion bid, calling the proposal a "leveraged buyout" that would saddle t...

item.title: 20% Off Home Depot Promo Code
item.description: Save up to 50% today with the latest Home Depot coupons for appliances, power tools, and more holiday deals this month.

item.title: How Quilt solved the heat pump’s biggest challenge
